<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<ServerDatas>
<!--服务器设置-->
<ServerGroup>
   <!--测试环境服务器-->
   <Server Name ="TestServer" Ip = "qizun78.com" Port = "8090"  AuthenAccountDir = "test_game"   />
   <!--生产环境服务器-->
   <Server Name = "ProduceServer" Ip = "211.159.216.18" Port = "8090"  AuthenAccountDir = "qizungame" />
</ServerGroup>

<!--大门服务器地址-->
<GameWayAddr Url = "http://{0}/{1}/poker_game/game_config.php"  />

<!--验证账号地址-->
<AuthenAccoutAddr 
     Url = "http://{0}/{1}/poker_game/req_auth.php?account_key={2}&account={3}" 
     PrivateKey = "crETi8D5xWpM38FT6pKdv7O2iXfoy79"/> 

<!--注册账号地址-->
<RegAccoutAddr 
     Url = "http://{0}/{1}/poker_game/req_create_role.php?uin={2}&sex={3}&nickname={4}" />

</ServerDatas>
